name: Zombie Blaster (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
Description: 

You play as a survivor of the zombie apocalypse. You find yourself in a city and need to defeat all of the zombies to survive. Can you make it out alive?

Instructions: 

Arrow keys/WASD to move, left click to shoot

Shoot the enemies(zombies)

If you are hit by a zombie you lose health

If you lose all of your health you lose
